00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: Io.php 238 2009-06-19 19:57:50Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief IO class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used for sloppy database input and output. It is extended by other objects to provide 
00007  * the user with a simple way to add fields to an object. Currently it can only interact with a single table.
00008  * 
00009  * The Boo ID concept is a generic reference to the unique ID for each row of a given table. In a typical table
00010  * of users the Boo ID would likely be the user ID column. If no unique column exists for a given table then you
00011  * should create a column called boo_id and designate it an autonumber and primary key 
00012  * (try <a href="http://www.phpmyadmin.net/">phpMyAdmin</a> for this).
00013  * The Boo ID will be the value of the column designated by Boo_Io::setPrimaryKey().
00014  * 
00015  * @class       Boo_Io
00016  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00017  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00018  * @copyright   2008 David  Singer
00019  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00020  * @version     2.0.1
00021  */
00022 
00023 class Boo_Io extends Boo_Db {
00024     /**
00025      * @brief Fields list.
00026      * 
00027      * Keys are field names, values are the field values.
00028      */
00029     protected $fields = array();
00030     
00031     /**
00032      * @brief Encrypted fields list.
00033      * 
00034      * Boo will encrypt fields on this list with \c BOO_AES_KEY before saving into database. 
00035      * Fields will be unencrypted when opened.
00036      */
00037     protected $encryptedFields = array();
00038     
00039     /**
00040      * @brief Ignored fields list.
00041      * 
00042      * Numerically indexed array of field names to ignore.
00043      * Boo will not save fields on this list, however it will store them during the same instance.
00044      */
00045     protected $ignoredFields = array();
00046     
00047     /**
00048      * @brief Magic field list.
00049      * 
00050      * Boo will automaticly manipulated these fields.
00051      */
00052     protected $magicFields = array();
00053     
00054     /**
00055      * @brief List of magic fields that this class handles.
00056      */
00057     protected $handledMagicFields = array(
00058         'created', 'modified', 'uuid', 'ip');
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * @brief Serialized fields list.
00062      * 
00063      * Boo will automaticly serialize and unserialize these fileds.
00064      */
00065     protected $serializedFields = array();
00066     
00067     /**
00068      * @brief Array fields list.
00069      * 
00070      * Boo will automaticly store and retrieve these fileds while still allowing SQL queries in the following form:
00071      * SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE value LIKE '%|search|%';
00072      * 
00073      * @attention This method violates table normalization rules. In most cases you should use joins instead.
00074      * @warning Only stores array values, keys are permanently lost.
00075      */
00076     protected $arrayFields = array();
00077     
00078     /**
00079      * @brief Boo ID.
00080      * 
00081      * The Boo ID is a unique ID for each item, usualy the primary key of a table.
00082      */
00083     protected $booId = false; // zero is a valid ID
00084     
00085     /**
00086      * @brief Default constructor.
00087      * 
00088      * Handles shorthand object initialization.
00089      * 
00090      * @param string $tableName[optional] The table name.
00091      * @param string $primaryKey[optional] The primary key.
00092      * @return void.
00093      */
00094     public function __construct($tableName = false, $primaryKey = false) {
00095         parent::__construct($tableName, $primaryKey);
00096     }
00097     
00098     /**
00099      * @brief Preloads values from fields into \c $_POST.
00100      * 
00101      * This only works well if the \c $_POST keys are the same as Boo_Io fields. Using
00102      * Boo_Html_Form_Xml::preloadPost() is safer for many uses.
00103      * 
00104      * @see Boo_Html_Form_Xml::preloadPost()
00105      * @param bool $override[optional] Override existing values.
00106      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00107      */
00108     public function preloadPost($override = true) {
00109         $override = (bool) $override;
00110         
00111         $fields = $this->getSafeFields();
00112         
00113         if (empty($fields)) {
00114             trigger_error('Fields is empty, nothing will be preloaded', E_USER_NOTICE);
00115             return false;
00116         }
00117         
00118         foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00119             if ($override) {
00120                 $_POST[$key] = $value;
00121             } else {
00122                 if (array_key_exists($key, $_POST)) {
00123                     // value already exists, skip
00124                 } else {
00125                     $_POST[$key] = $value;
00126                 }
00127             }
00128         }
00129         
00130         return true;
00131     }
00132     
00133     /**
00134      * @brief Sets a field.
00135      * 
00136      * API shorthand for Boo_Io::setField().
00137      * 
00138      * @param string $field The field to set.
00139      * @param string $value The value of the field.
00140      * @return bool Returns TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00141      */
00142     public function set($field, $value) { return $this->setField($field, $value); }
00143     
00144     /**
00145      * @brief Sets a field.
00146      * 
00147      * @param string $field The field to set.
00148      * @param string $value The value of the field.
00149      * @return bool Returns TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00150      */
00151     public function setField($field, $value) {
00152         $field = trim($field);
00153         
00154         if (is_string($value)) {
00155             $value = trim($value);
00156         } // else leave alone
00157         
00158         if ($field == 'boo_id') {
00159             trigger_error('Field boo_id is reserved for internal use', E_USER_WARNING);
00160             return false;
00161         }
00162         
00163         $this->fields[$field] = $value;
00164         
00165         return true;
00166     }
00167     
00168     /**
00169      * @brief Adds a field to the encrypted list.
00170      * 
00171      * @param string $field The field name to encrypt.
00172      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise. Will return TRUE if field is already encrypted.
00173      */
00174     public function setEncryptedField($field) {
00175         $field = trim($field);
00176         if ($field) {
00177             if (in_array($field, $this->encryptedFields)) {
00178                 // field is already in array, no need to add it again
00179                 return true;
00180             } else {
00181                 $this->encryptedFields[] = $field;
00182                 return true;
00183             }
00184         } else {
00185             trigger_error('Field can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188     }
00189     
00190     /**
00191      * @brief Adds a field to the ignored list.
00192      * 
00193      * @param string $field The field name to ignore.
00194      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise. Will return TRUE if field is already ignored.
00195      */
00196     public function setIgnoredField($field) {
00197         $field = trim($field);
00198         if ($field) {
00199             if (in_array($field, $this->ignoredFields)) {
00200                 // field is already in array, no need to add it again
00201                 return true;
00202             } else {
00203                 $this->ignoredFields[] = $field;
00204                 return true;
00205             }
00206         } else {
00207             trigger_error('Field can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00208             return false;
00209         }
00210     }
00211     
00212     /**
00213      * @brief Adds a field to the magic list.
00214      * 
00215      * Provides API compatibility. Performs the same function as Boo_Io::addMagicField().
00216      * 
00217      * @param string $field The field name to protect.
00218      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise. Will return TRUE if field is already magic.
00219      */
00220     public function setMagicField($field) {
00221         $field = trim($field);
00222         if ($field) {
00223             if (in_array($field, $this->magicFields)) {
00224                 // field is already in array, no need to add it again
00225                 return true;
00226             } else {
00227                 if (in_array($field, $this->handledMagicFields)) {
00228                     $this->magicFields[] = $field;
00229                     return true;
00230                 } else {
00231                     trigger_error("Magic field {$field} is not handled", E_USER_WARNING);
00232                     return false;
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         } else {
00236             trigger_error('Field can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00237             return false;
00238         }
00239     }
00240

00242      * @brief Adds a field to the serialized list.
00243      * 
00244      * Provides API compatibility. Performs the same function as Boo_Io::addSerializedField().
00245      * 
00246      * @param string $field The field name to protect.
00247      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise. Will return TRUE if field is already serialized.
00248      */
00249     public function setSerializedField($field) {
00250         $field = trim($field);
00251         if ($field) {
00252             if (in_array($field, $this->serializedFields)) {
00253                 // field is already in array, no need to add it again
00254                 return true;
00255             } else {
00256                 $this->serializedFields[] = $field;
00257                 return true;
00258             }
00259         } else {
00260             trigger_error('Field can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00261             return false;
00262         }
00263     }

00281                 return true;

00355     /**
00356      * @brief Removes a field
00357      * 
00358      * @param string $field The field name.
00359      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00360      */
00361     public function removeField($field) {
00362         $field = trim($field);
00363         if (array_key_exists($field, $this->fields)) {
00364             unset($this->fields[$field]);
00365             return true;
00366         } else {
00367             return false;
00368         }
00369         
00370     }
00371     
00372     /**
00373      * @brief Removes a field from the encrypted fields list
00374      * 
00375      * @param string $field The field to remove.
00376      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00377      */
00378     public function removeEncryptedField($field) {
00379         $field = trim($field);
00380         $key = array_search($field, $this->encryptedFields);
00381         
00382         if ($key === false) {
00383             // field not protected
00384             return false;
00385         } else {
00386             // remove from list
00387             unset($this->encryptedFields[$key]);
00388             return true;
00389         }
00390     }
00391     
00392     /**
00393      * @brief Removes a field from the ignored fields list

00397      */
00398     public function removeIgnoredField($field) {
00399         $field = trim($field);
00400         $key = array_search($field, $this->ignoredFields);
00401         
00402         if ($key === false) {
00403             // field not protected
00404             return false;

00406             // remove from list

00409         }

00482     
00483     /**
00484      * @brief Gets a field value.
00485      * 
00486      * @param string $field The field name.
00487      * @return bool Returns the value of the field if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00488      */
00489     public function getField($field) {
00490         if (array_key_exists($field, $this->fields)) {
00491             $value = $this->fields[$field];
00492             return $value;
00493             
00494         } else {
00495             return false;
00496         }
00497     }
00498     
00499     /**
00500      * @brief Sets multiple fields.
00501      * 
00502      * This function will clear the list of fields prior to setting them.
00503      * 
00504      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Key is field name, value is field value.
00505      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00506      */
00507     public function setFields(array $fields) {
00508         if (!empty($fields)) {
00509             $result = true;
00510             $this->fields = array(); // clear array
00511             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00512                 $result = $result && $this->setField($key, $value);
00513             }
00514             $result = $result && !empty($this->fields); // return true only if atleast one field was set
00515             return $result;
00516         } else {
00517             trigger_error('Fields should not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00518             return false;
00519         }
00520     }
00521     
00522     /**
00523      * @brief Sets the list of encrypted fields.
00524      * 
00525      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Keys are numeric, values are the field names.
00526      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00527      */
00528     public function setEncryptedFields(array $fields) {
00529         if (empty($fields)) {
00530             trigger_error('Fields can not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00531             return false;
00532         } else {
00533             $this->encryptedFields = array(); // clear list
00534             $result = true;
00535             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00536                 $result = $result && $this->setEncryptedField($value);
00537             }
00538             return $result && !empty($this->encryptedFields); // fields added successfully and more than zero fields
00539         }
00540     }
00541     
00542     /**
00543      * @brief Sets the list of ignored fields.
00544      * 
00545      * Boo_Io will not save fields that are ignored. This function will clear the list of 
00546      * ignored fields before replacing it.
00547      * 
00548      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Keys are numeric, values are the field names.
00549      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00550      */
00551     public function setIgnoredFields(array $fields) {
00552         if (empty($fields)) {
00553             trigger_error('Fields can not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00554             return false;
00555         } else {
00556             $this->ignoredFields = array(); // clear list
00557             $result = true;
00558             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00559                 $result = $result && $this->setIgnoredField($value);
00560             }
00561             return $result && !empty($this->ignoredFields); // fields added successfully and more than zero fields
00562         }
00563     }
00564     
00565     /**
00566      * @brief Sets the list of magic fields.
00567      * 
00568      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Keys are numeric, values are the field names.
00569      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00570      */
00571     public function setMagicFields(array $fields) {
00572         if (empty($fields)) {
00573             trigger_error('Fields can not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00574             return false;
00575         } else {
00576             $this->magicFields = array(); // clear list
00577             $result = true;
00578             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00579                 $result = $result && $this->setMagicField($value);
00580             }
00581             return $result && !empty($this->magicFields); // fields added successfully and more than zero fields
00582         }
00583     }

00591     public function setSerializedFields(array $fields) {

00631      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.

00633     public function addFields(array $fields) {
00634         if (!empty($fields)) {
00635             $result = true;
00636             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00637                 $result = $result && $this->setField($key, $value);
00638             }
00639             $result = $result && !empty($this->fields); // return true only if atleast one field was set
00640             return $result;
00641         } else {
00642             trigger_error('Fields should not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00643             return false;
00644         }
00645     }

00685     /**
00686      * @brief Adds fields to the list of magic fields.
00687      * 
00688      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Keys are numeric, values are the field names.
00689      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00690      */
00691     public function addMagicFields(array $fields) {
00692         if (empty($fields)) {
00693             trigger_error('Fields can not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00694             return false;
00695         } else {
00696             $result = true;
00697             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00698                 $result = $result && $this->addMagicField($value);
00699             }
00700             return $result;
00701         }
00702     }
00703     
00704     /**
00705      * @brief Adds fields to the list of serialized fields.
00706      * 
00707      * @param array $fields An array of fields. Keys are numeric, values are the field names.
00708      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00709      */
00710     public function addSerializedFields(array $fields) {
00711         if (empty($fields)) {
00712             trigger_error('Fields can not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE);
00713             return false;
00714         } else {
00715             $result = true;
00716             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00717                 $result = $result && $this->addSerializedField($value);
00718             }
00719             return $result;
00720         }
00721     }

00964     public function isField($field) {

00967     }

00977         return in_array($field, $this->encryptedFields);
00978     }

00997     public function isMagicField($field) {

01045     public function hasFields() { return !empty($this->fields); }

01047     /**
01048      * @brief Determins if object has encrpyted fields.
01049      * 
01050      * @return bool Returns TRUE if encrypted fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01051      */
01052     public function hasEncryptedFields() { return !empty($this->encrpytedFields); }
01053     
01054     /**
01055      * @brief Determins if object has ignored fields.
01056      * 
01057      * @return bool Returns TRUE if ingnored fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01058      */
01059     public function hasIgnoredFields() { return !empty($this->protectedFields); }
01060     
01061     /**
01062      * @brief Determins if object has magic fields.
01063      * 
01064      * @return bool Returns TRUE if magic fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01065      */
01066     public function hasMagicFields() { return !empty($this->magicFields); }
01067

01069      * @brief Determins if object has serialized fields.
01070      * 
01071      * @return bool Returns TRUE if serialized fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01072      */
01073     public function hasSerializedFields() { return !empty($this->serializedFields); }

01075     /**
01076      * @brief Determins if object has any array fields.
01077      * 
01078      * @return bool Returns TRUE if array fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01079      */
01080     public function hasArrayFields() { return !empty($this->arrayFields); }
01081     
01082     /**
01083      * @brief Determins if object has safe fields.
01084      * 
01085      * @return bool Returns TRUE if safe fields are present, FALSE otherwise.
01086      */
01087     public function hasSafeFields() {
01088         $safeFields = $this->getSafeFields();
01089         return !empty($safeFields);
01090     }
01091     
01092     /**
01093      * @brief Returns an array of fields that are safe to open or save.
01094      * 
01095      * Will not include fields that are ignored.
01096      * 
01097      * @return array Returns array of safe fields on success, FALSE otherwise.
01098      * */
01099     public function getSafeFields() {
01100         $safeFields = array();
01101         
01102         if (empty($this->fields)) {
01103             if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error('Fields should not be empty', E_USER_NOTICE); }
01104             return false;
01105         }
01106         
01107         foreach ($this->fields as $key => $value) {
01108             if (!$this->isIgnoredField($key)) {
01109                 $safeFields[$key] = $value;
01110             }
01111         }
01112         
01113         if (empty($safeFields)) {
01114             if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error('Safe fields is empty', E_USER_NOTICE); }
01115             return false;
01116         }
01117         
01118         return $safeFields;
01119     }
01120     
01121     /**
01122      * @brief Sets the Boo ID.
01123      * 
01124      * @param mixed $booId The Boo ID.
01125      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.
01126      */
01127     private function setBooId($booId) {
01128         $booId = trim($booId);
01129         
01130         if ($booId === false) {
01131             trigger_error("Boo ID {$booId} can not equal false", E_USER_WARNING);
01132             return false;
01133         } else {
01134             $this->booId = $booId;
01135             return true;
01136         }
01137     }
01138 
01139     /**
01140      * @brief Gets the Boo ID.
01141      * 
01142      * Boo ID will be unique for each item in a table.
01143      * 
01144      * @return int The Boo ID.
01145      */
01146     public function getBooId() { return $this->booId; }
01147     
01148     /**
01149      * @brief Merges data from a Boo_Io object.
01150      * 
01151      * @param Boo_Io $io The object to merge.
01152      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
01153      */
01154     public function merge(Boo_Io $io) {
01155         $beforeMerge = $this->beforeMerge($io);
01156         if ($beforeMerge === false) {
01157             return false;
01158         } else {
01159             $io = $beforeMerge;
01160         }
01161         
01162         
01163         if ($io->isEmpty()) {
01164             trigger_error('Object is empty, merge aborted', E_USER_WARNING);
01165             return false;
01166         }
01167         
01168         $result = true;
01169         $result = $result && $this->addFields($io->getFields());
01170         
01171         if ($io->hasEncryptedFields()) {
01172             $result = $result && $this->addEncryptedFields($io->getEncryptedFields());
01173         }
01174         
01175         if ($io->hasIgnoredFields()) {
01176             $result = $result && $this->addIgnoredFields($io->getIgnoredFields());
01177         }
01178         
01179         if ($io->hasMagicFields()) {
01180             $result = $result && $this->addMagicFields($io->getMagicFields());
01181         }
01182         
01183         if ($io->hasSerializedFields()) {
01184             $result = $result && $this->addSerializedFields($io->getSerilizedFields());
01185         }
01186         
01187         if ($io->hasArrayFields()) {
01188             $result = $result && $this->addArrayFields($io->getArrayFields());
01189         }
01190         
01191         if ($this->afterMerge($result) === false) {
01192             return false;
01193         }
01194         return $result;
01195     }
01196     
01197     /**
01198      * @brief Called before Boo_Io::merge().
01199      * 
01200      * @param Boo_Io $io The object to merge.
01201      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01202      */
01203     protected function beforeMerge($io) {
01204         return $io;
01205     }
01206     
01207     /**
01208      * @brief Called after Boo_Io::merge().
01209      * 
01210      * @param bool $result The result of Boo_Io::merge().
01211      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01212      */
01213     protected function afterMerge($result) {
01214         return true;
01215     }
01216     
01217     /**
01218      * @brief Allows you to save current instance of the object as a differnt Boo ID.
01219      * @return bool Returns the result of Boo_Io::save() after Boo ID is changed.
01220      * @param int $booId
01221      */
01222     public function saveAs($booId) {
01223         if ($this->setBooId($booId)) {
01224             return $this->save();
01225         } else {
01226             return false;
01227         }
01228     }
01229     
01230     /**
01231      * @brief Saves the fields to the database.
01232      * 
01233      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
01234      */
01235     public function save() {
01236         if ($this->beforeSave() === false) {
01237             return false;
01238         }
01239         
01240         $this->handleMagicFields();
01241         
01242         $safeFields = $this->getSafeFields();
01243         
01244         if (empty($safeFields)) {
01245             trigger_error('Safe fields is empty, can not continue', E_USER_WARNING);
01246             return false;
01247         }
01248         
01249         $result = false;
01250         
01251         if ($this->booId === false) {
01252             // add new row
01253             $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01254             
01255             // build sql statment
01256             $sql = "INSERT INTO {$this->tableName} ( ";
01257             
01258             foreach ($safeFields as $key => $value) {
01259                 $sql .= "{$key},";
01260             }
01261             
01262             $sql = Boo_Csv::fixLastComma($sql);
01263                 
01264             $sql .= ') VALUES (';
01265             
01266             foreach ($safeFields as $key => $value) {
01267                 if($this->isSerializedField($key)) {
01268                     $safeFields[$key] = serialize($value);
01269                 }
01270                 
01271                 if($this->isArrayField($key)) {
01272                     if (is_array($value)) {
01273                         $tmp = ''; 
01274                         foreach ($value as $arrayKey => $arrayValue) {
01275                             $tmp .= "\"{$arrayKey}\":\"{$arrayValue}\"|";
01276                         }
01277                         $tmp = rtrim($tmp, '|');
01278                         $safeFields[$key] = $tmp;
01279                     } elseif (Boo_Validator::isNull($value)) {
01280                         // null is ok
01281                         $safeFields[$key] == '';
01282                     } else {
01283                         trigger_error("Field {$key} can not contain the value {$value}", E_USER_WARNING);
01284                         return false;
01285                     }
01286                 }
01287                 
01288                 if ($this->isEncryptedField($key)) {
01289                     $sql .= "AES_ENCRYPT(:{$key}, '" . BOO_AES_KEY . "'),";
01290                 } else {
01291                     // regular field
01292                     $sql .= ":{$key},";
01293                 }
01294             }
01295             
01296             $sql = Boo_Csv::fixLastComma($sql);
01297             
01298             $sql .= ')';
01299             
01300             $stmt = $dbh->prepare($sql);
01301             
01302             foreach ($safeFields as $key => $value) {
01303                 $stmt->bindValue(":{$key}", $safeFields[$key]);
01304             }
01305             
01306             try {
01307                 $result = $stmt->execute();
01308             } catch (Exception $e) {
01309                 trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01310                 return false;
01311             }
01312             // set Boo ID and the primary key
01313             $this->booId = $dbh->lastInsertId();
01314             
01315         } else {
01316             // update existing row
01317             $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01318             
01319             $sql = "UPDATE {$this->tableName} SET {$this->primaryKey} = :boo_id, ";
01320             
01321             foreach ($safeFields as $key => $value) {
01322                 if($this->isSerializedField($key)) {
01323                     $safeFields[$key] = serialize($value);
01324                 }
01325                 
01326                 if($this->isArrayField($key)) {
01327                     if (is_array($value)) {
01328                         $tmp = ''; 
01329                         foreach ($value as $arrayKey => $arrayValue) {
01330                             $tmp .= "\"{$arrayKey}\":\"{$arrayValue}\"|";
01331                         }
01332                         $tmp = rtrim($tmp, '|');
01333                         $safeFields[$key] = $tmp;
01334                     } elseif (Boo_Validator::isNull($value)) {
01335                         // null is ok
01336                         $safeFields[$key] == '';
01337                     } else {
01338                         trigger_error("Field {$key} can not contain the value {$value}", E_USER_WARNING);
01339                         return false;
01340                     }
01341                 }
01342                 
01343                 if ($this->isEncryptedField($key)) {
01344                     $sql .= "{$key} = AES_ENCRYPT(:{$key}, '" . BOO_AES_KEY . "'),";
01345                 } else {
01346                     // regular field
01347                     $sql .= "{$key} = :{$key},";
01348                 }
01349             }
01350             $sql = Boo_CSV::fixLastComma($sql);
01351             
01352             $sql .= " WHERE {$this->primaryKey} = :boo_id LIMIT 1"; // keep space before WHERE
01353             
01354             $stmt = $dbh->prepare($sql);
01355             
01356             $stmt->bindParam(':boo_id', $this->booId);
01357             
01358             foreach ($safeFields as $key => $value) {
01359                 $stmt->bindValue(":{$key}", $safeFields[$key]);
01360             }
01361             
01362             try {
01363                 $result = $stmt->execute();
01364             } catch (Exception $e) {
01365                 trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01366                 return false;
01367             }
01368             
01369         }
01370         
01371         if ($this->afterSave($result) === false) {
01372             return false;
01373         }
01374         //echo $sql; // usefull for debugging
01375         return true;
01376         
01377     }
01378     
01379     /**
01380      * @brief Called before Boo_Io::save().
01381      * 
01382      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01383      */
01384     protected function beforeSave() {
01385         return true;
01386     }
01387     
01388     /**
01389      * @brief Called after Boo_Io::save().
01390      * 
01391      * @param bool $result The result of Boo_Io::save().
01392      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01393      */
01394     protected function afterSave($result) {
01395         return true;
01396     }
01397     
01398     /**
01399      * @brief Deletes and item for the database.
01400      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
01401      */
01402     public function delete() {
01403         if ($this->beforeDelete() === false) {
01404             return false;
01405         }
01406         
01407         if ($this->booId === false) {
01408             trigger_error('Boo ID can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
01409             return false;
01410         }
01411         
01412         $result = false;
01413         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01414             
01415         $sql = "DELETE FROM {$this->tableName} WHERE {$this->primaryKey} = :boo_id";
01416         $stmt = $dbh->prepare($sql);
01417         $stmt->bindParam(':boo_id', $this->booId);
01418         
01419         try {
01420             $result = $stmt->execute();
01421         } catch (Exception $e) {
01422             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01423             return false;
01424         }
01425         
01426         if ($this->afterDelete($result) === false) {
01427             return false;
01428         }
01429         
01430         return $result;
01431     }
01432     
01433     /**
01434      * @brief Called before Boo_Io::delete().
01435      * 
01436      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01437      */
01438     protected function beforeDelete() {
01439         return true;
01440     }

01452     /**
01453      * @brief Counts all the rows in the table.
01454      * @return int Returns the row count, FALSE on failure.
01455      */
01456     public function count() {
01457         $result = false;
01458         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01459         $sql = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {$this->tableName}";
01460         
01461         try {
01462             $stmt = $dbh->query($sql);
01463             $result = $stmt->fetchColumn();
01464         } catch (Exception $e) {
01465             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01466             return false;
01467         }
01468         
01469         return $result;
01470     }
01471     
01472     /**
01473      * @brief Opens the object.
01474      * 
01475      * Loads values from database.
01476      * 
01477      * @param int $booId The Boo ID.
01478      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
01479      */
01480     public function open($booId) {
01481         $beforeOpen = $this->beforeOpen($booId);
01482         if ($beforeOpen === false) {
01483             return false;
01484         } else {
01485             $booId = $beforeOpen;
01486         }
01487         
01488         if ($booId === false) {
01489             trigger_error('Boo ID can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
01490             return false;
01491         }
01492         
01493         $booId = trim($booId);
01494         
01495         $result = false;
01496         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01497         
01498         $columns = '*';
01499         
01500         foreach ($this->encryptedFields as $key => $value) {
01501             $columns .= ", AES_DECRYPT({$value}, '" . BOO_AES_KEY . "') AS {$value}";
01502         }
01503         
01504         $sql = "SELECT {$columns} FROM {$this->tableName} WHERE {$this->primaryKey} = :boo_id LIMIT 1";
01505         
01506         $stmt = $dbh->prepare($sql);
01507         
01508         $stmt->bindParam(':boo_id', $booId);
01509         
01510         try {
01511             $stmt->execute();
01512             $results = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); // returns array
01513             if (empty($results)) {
01514                 trigger_error("Boo ID {$booId} is not valid", E_USER_NOTICE);
01515                 $result = false;
01516             } else {
01517                 $result = true;
01518                 $this->addFields($results); // add results to fields
01519                 $this->booId = $booId; // set the Boo ID to the ID that was opened
01520                 
01521                 // handle serialized fields
01522                 foreach ($this->serializedFields as $key => $value) {
01523                     if (isset($this->fields[$value])) {
01524                         $this->fields[$value] = unserialize($this->fields[$value]);
01525                     }
01526                 }
01527                 
01528                 // handle array fields
01529                 foreach ($this->arrayFields as $key => $value) {
01530                     if (isset($this->fields[$value])) {
01531                         if (Boo_Validator::isNull($this->fields[$value])) {
01532                             // empty array
01533                             $this->fields[$value] = array();
01534                         } else {
01535                             
01536                             $tmpFields = explode('|', $this->fields[$value]);
01537                             $tmpResults = array();
01538                             foreach ($tmpFields as $fieldKey => $fieldValue) {
01539                                 $tmpValues = explode(':', $fieldValue);
01540                                 $tmpResults[trim($tmpValues[0], '"')] = trim($tmpValues[1], '"');
01541                             }
01542                                                         
01543                             $this->fields[$value] = $tmpResults;
01544                         }
01545                     }
01546                 }
01547             }
01548         } catch (Exception $e) {
01549             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01550             return false;
01551         }
01552         
01553         if ($this->afterOpen($result) === false) {
01554             return false;
01555         }
01556         //echo $sql; // usefull for debugging
01557         return $result;
01558     }
01559     
01560     /**
01561      * @brief Called before Boo_Io::open().
01562      * 
01563      * @param int $booId The Boo ID.
01564      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01565      */
01566     protected function beforeOpen($booId) {
01567         return $booId;
01568     }

01574      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
01575      */
01576     protected function afterOpen($result) {
01577         return true;
01578     }
01579     /**
01580      * @brief Close the object.
01581      * 
01582      * Provides API function for future implementation.
01583      * 
01584      * @todo Implement this function and preform cleanup.
01585      * @return bool Always returns TRUE.
01586      */
01587     public function close() {
01588         if ($this->beforeClose() === false) {
01589             return false;
01590         }
01591         
01592         $result = true;
01593         // put cleanup code here
01594         
01595         if ($this->afterClose($result) === false) {
01596             return false;
01597         }
01598         return true;
01599     }

01601     /**
01602      * @brief Converts empty strings in fields to null.
01603      * @return int Returns the number of fields changed.
01604      * @param array $excludeFields[optional] Fields to exclude.
01605      */
01606     public function fixNulls(array $excludeFields = array()) {
01607         $count = 0;
01608         foreach ($this->fields as $key => $value) {
01609             if (in_array($key, $excludeFields)) {
01610                 // skip
01611             } else {
01612                 if ($value === '') {
01613                     $count++;
01614                     $this->fields[$key] = null;
01615                 }
01616             }
01617         }
01618         
01619         return $count;
01620     }

01682     /**
01683      * @brief Clears session.
01684      * 
01685      * @param string $key[optional] The session key.
01686      * @return bool Returns TRUE if key exists, FALSE otherwise.
01687      */
01688     public function clearSession($key = 'boo_io') {
01689         $key = trim($key);
01690         if (array_key_exists($key, $_SESSION)) {
01691             unset($_SESSION[$key]);
01692             return true;
01693         } else {
01694             trigger_error("Key {$key} was not found, session is probably already destroyed", E_USER_NOTICE);
01695             return false;
01696         }
01697     }

01699     public function isEmpty() { return empty($this->fields); }
01700     
01701     /**
01702      * @brief Determins if an item exists in a given column.
01703      * 
01704      * @param string $search The search string.
01705      * @param string $column The column name.
01706      * @param string $tableName The table name.
01707      * @param mixed $primaryKey The primary key for the table, should be a Boo ID.
01708      * @return mixed Returns Boo ID on success, FALSE on failure.
01709      */
01710     public static function exists($search, $column, $tableName, $primaryKey) {
01711         $column = trim($column);
01712         $tableName = trim($tableName);
01713         $primaryKey = trim($primaryKey);
01714         $booId = false; // default to failure
01715         
01716         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($column)) {
01717             trigger_error("The column {$column} contains illegal characters, SQL injection likely", E_USER_ERROR);
01718             return false;
01719         }
01720         
01721         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($tableName)) {
01722             trigger_error("The table name {$tableName} contains illegal characters, SQL injection likely", E_USER_ERROR);
01723             return false;
01724         }
01725         
01726         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($primaryKey)) {
01727             trigger_error("The primary key {$primaryKey} contains illegal characters, SQL injection likely", E_USER_ERROR);
01728             return false;
01729         }
01730         
01731         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
01732         
01733         $stmt = $dbh->prepare("SELECT {$primaryKey} FROM {$tableName} WHERE {$column} = :search LIMIT 1");
01734         $stmt->bindParam(':search', $search);
01735         
01736         $stmt->bindColumn($primaryKey, $booId);
01737         
01738         try {
01739             $stmt->execute();
01740             $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_BOUND);
01741             /*
01742              * If successfull Boo ID should now be the value of the primary key,
01743              * usualy a positive non zero integer.
01744              * If nothing was found then an empty string is returned.
01745              */
01746         } catch (Exception $e) {
01747             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
01748             return false;
01749         }
01750         
01751         // change empty string to false, ignore 0
01752         if ($booId === '') { $booId = false;}
01753         
01754         return $booId;
01755     }
01756     
01757     /**
01758      * @brief Handles magic fields.
01759      * 
01760      * Function is called by Boo_Io::save() after Boo_Io::beforeSave().
01761      * 
01762      * @return bool Returns TRUE if magic fields were handled, FALSE otherwise.
01763      */
01764     public function handleMagicFields() {
01765         if (!$this->hasMagicFields()) {
01766             return false;
01767         }
01768         
01769         // handle created field
01770         if ($this->isMagicField('created')) {
01771             if (!isset($this->fields['created'])) {
01772                 $this->fields['created'] = time();
01773             }
01774         }
01775         
01776         // handle modified field
01777         if ($this->isMagicField('modified')) {
01778             // always overwrite existing value
01779             $this->fields['modified'] = time();
01780         }
01781         
01782         // handle UUID field
01783         if ($this->isMagicField('uuid')) {
01784             if (!isset($this->fields['uuid'])) {
01785                 $this->fields['uuid'] = Boo_Helper::getUuid();
01786             }
01787         }
01788         
01789         // handle IP field
01790         if ($this->isMagicField('ip')) {
01791             if (!isset($this->fields['ip'])) {
01792                 $this->fields['ip'] = Boo_Page::getIp();
01793             }
01794         }
01795         return true;
01796     }

01824     /**
01825      * @brief Prints HTML for debuging.
01826      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
01827      * @return string HTML debug information.
01828      */
01829     public function htmlDebugDiv(array $attrs = array()) {
01830         
01831         if (BOO_PRODUCTION) {
01832             trigger_error('Function is not available in production mode, set BOO_PRDOUCTION to FALSE', E_USER_ERROR);
01833             return false;
01834         }
01835         
01836         $tmp = '<h1>Boo_Io::htmlDebug()</h1><h2>Fields</h2><ul>';
01837         
01838         foreach ($this->fields as $key => $value) {
01839             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01840         }
01841         
01842         $tmp .= '</ul><h2>Encrypted Fields</h2><ul>';
01843         
01844         foreach ($this->encryptedFields as $key => $value) {
01845             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01846         }
01847         
01848         $tmp .= '</ul><h2>Ignored Fields</h2><ul>';
01849         
01850         foreach ($this->ignoredFields as $key => $value) {
01851             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01852         }
01853         
01854         $tmp .= '</ul><h2>Magic Fields</h2><ul>';
01855         
01856         foreach ($this->magicFields as $key => $value) {
01857             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01858         }
01859         
01860         $tmp .= '</ul><h3>Handled Magic Fields</h3><ul>';
01861         
01862         foreach ($this->handledMagicFields as $key => $value) {
01863             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01864         }
01865         
01866         $tmp .= '</ul><h2>Serizlized Fields</h2><ul>';
01867         
01868         foreach ($this->serializedFields as $key => $value) {
01869             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01870         }
01871         
01872         $tmp .= '</ul><h2>Array Fields</h2><ul>';
01873         
01874         foreach ($this->arrayFields as $key => $value) {
01875             $tmp .= "<li><b>{$key}</b>: {$value}</li>";
01876         }
01877         
01878         $tmp .= "</ul><h1>Boo ID</h1><p>{$this->booId}</p>";
01879         
01880         
01881         $div = new Boo_Html_Div;
01882         $div->applyAttrs($attrs);
01883         $div->setContent($tmp);
01884         return $div;
01885     }
